text: Mana nikhuchelamia- nikhuhelesia- Abandu balolekhananga abateshele, ebukwe nende mumbo weshialo ewakhwarayo tsikhabi. Mana likhuwa lilayi lia- Nyasaye nililengâ€™ana khubaana ba Israil, khulwa okhwisumilisia khwabu, mana nikhusishia aka Firaun yakholanga nende Abandu bebe, nende bilia ebiabombakhanga
